MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Mitosis | d: Genetics

MCQ: What is the basic unit of life that all organisms are made up of?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Tissues

MCQ: What process allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Digestion | d: Circulation

MCQ: How long ago did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 million years ago | b: 500 million years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 10 billion years ago
